actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend title VII of the Public Health Service Act to provide for the making of grants to appropriate colleges and universities to assist them in the establishment and operation of programs for the training of nurse practitioners to provide primary health care in nursing homes.

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to make grants to colleges and universities to assist them in the establishment and operation of programs training nurse practitioners to provide primarily health care in nursing homes. Specifies minimum guidelines the Secretary must prescribe for such programs.

titles.title: A bill to amend title VII of the Public Health Service Act to provide for the making of grants to appropriate colleges and universities to assist them in the establishment and operation of programs for the training of nurse practitioners to provide primary health care in nursing homes.
